title: 04/22/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 04/22/21 DPS Best Of
description:
Ahmed Fareed, in for Dan Patrick, joins the Danettes to break down the NFL draft and a number of new rules approved by the league. Ben Volin of the Boston Globe joins the show to talk about the leagues rule changes, the NFL draft and what the Patriots could do with their first-round pick. And Matt Maiocco of NBC Sports Bay Area shares his thoughts on the 49ers and which quarterback they will likely take in next week's draft.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
